H0.text: What is the name of a calculating machine that originally consisted of beans or stones moved in grooves in sand or on tablets of wood, stone, or metal. Suanpan

H1.text: What is the name of a calculating machine that originally consisted of beans or stones moved in grooves in sand or on tablets of wood, stone, or metal. Napier's Bones

H2.text: What is the name of a calculating machine that originally consisted of beans or stones moved in grooves in sand or on tablets of wood, stone, or metal. Counting Frame

H3.text: What is the name of a calculating machine that originally consisted of beans or stones moved in grooves in sand or on tablets of wood, stone, or metal. Abaci

A4.text: An abacus is also called a counting frame

A5.text: The plural of abacus is abaci
